channel.title: hub on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in hub on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: OSS Design Hub
item.description: OSS Design Hub Mission Establish an OSS world to literally design a better future Problem Most great designs share the same components, yet they are heavily under-utilized Great design patterns have great reproducibility, yet very closed Difficult for designers to get exposure in the internet Solution Github for the OSS design community for a better experience as a whole Publishing made for non-commercial whilst providing user data for analytics Design projects to integrate outside for a team priced plan
item.content:encoded: OSS Design Hub Mission Establish an OSS world to literally design a better future Problem Most great designs share the same components, yet they are heavily under-utilized Great design patterns have great reproducibility, yet very closed Difficult for designers to get exposure in the internet Solution Github for the OSS design community for a better experience as a whole Publishing made for non-commercial whilst providing user data for analytics Design projects to integrate outside for a team priced plan
